body: elias @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/posting.php?mode=reply&f=82&t=7121#pr127050 music options in Magarena, maybe for starters such as a title screen track, menu track, playing a game track. I am sure we could compose something simple or find someone who can do it. Or get around using royalty free music. And/or let the user choose his/her own tracks.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: in game music

comments.body: **Summary:** in game music (was: ingame music)
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on July 28, 2013 09:36:22_

elias @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/posting.php?mode=reply&f=82&t=7121#pr127050 music options in Magarena, maybe for starters such as a title screen track, menu track, playing a game track. I am sure we could compose something simple or find someone who can do it. Or get around using royalty free music. And/or let the user choose his/her own tracks.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=376_
